titleStmt.display: Information about the title of this work and those responsible for its content
titleStmt.title: Title of the text

respStmt.resp: Person responsible for the transcription of this text
Person responsible for the revision of this text
Person responsible for the POS tagging of this text

sourceDesc.display: Description of the source from which this digital text was derived

msDesc.display: Description of a manuscript this text is transcribed from

msIdentifier.institution: Institution where the manuscript is held
msIdentifier.settlement: Place/Settlement where the manuscript is held

recordingStmt.display: The description of an audio/video recording for this file

media.url: Filename of the audio file (url or local file)

profileDesc.display: description of non-bibliographic aspects of the text

particDesc.display: Description of the participants in this text

person.id: Unique ID for the student/speaker/author of this text
person.name: Name of the student/speaker/author

birth.when: Year of birth of the student/speaker/author

placeName.geo: Geolocation coordinates (lat lng) of the birth place of the student/speaker/author

birth.date: Date of birth of the student/speaker/author

death.when: Year of death of the student/speaker/author

placeName.geo: Geolocation coordinates (lat lng) of the death place of the student/speaker/author

death.date: Date of death of the student/speaker/author

langKnowledge.langKnown: Other languages spoken by the student/speaker/author as native language
Other languages learnt by the student/speaker/author as non-native language

langLearning.lang: ISO 639-2 code for the language the student is learning
langLearning.display: Description of the language learning circumstances(Learner corpus)

time.months: Duration (in months) the student has been learning this L2

langLearning.previous: Previous course taken by the student for this L2

time.months: Duration (in months) the student spent in a country the this L2 is spoken

langLearning.proficiency: Proficiency level the student is training for

person.residence: Place of residence of the student/speaker/author

nationality.key: ISO 3166 code for the nationality of the student/speaker/author

language.ident: ISO 639-2 code for the language in which this text is written

langUsage.language: Language in which this text is written

taskDesc.display: Description of the task this text was created for

task.id: Unique ID for the task of this text
task.title: Description of the task (as given to the student)
task.affiliation: Institution where the current L2 course is given
task.setting: Settings of the task (time-limited, with reference material, etc.)
task.desc: Relevant background details about the task

date.when: Year the task was handed in

task.date: Date the task was handed in

date.when: Best guess year for this text

name.geo: Geolocation (lat lng) for the place where this manuscript was written

encodingDesc.display: Relationship between the electronic text and the source
